docs.text: Here is the updated 7-day meal plan with your requested modifications, including avocado, idli, uttapam, and other food options for boosting hemoglobin and ferritin levels: 7-Day Meal Plan Breakfast Options (Daily) Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Ripe Banana with oats, Chia pudding, Raisins Bananas are rich in potassium and vitamin C, which improves iron absorption. Oats and raisins are rich in iron. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with almond butter on whole wheat toast, Orange juice Banana offers iron and potassium, almond butter adds healthy fats, and orange juice provides vitamin C to help absorption. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with oats, Raisins, Flaxseeds Ripe bananas are rich in iron and help digestion, while raisins and flaxseeds boost iron and omega-3 content. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with chia seeds and almonds, Fresh orange juice Banana offers iron, chia seeds add omega-3 and fiber, while orange juice provides vitamin C. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with almonds, Raisins, Flaxseeds, Chia pudding Bananas provide iron and potassium, almonds and raisins help with iron absorption. Flaxseeds and chia seeds boost omega-3 content. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with oats, raisins, almonds Bananas provide iron, and oats with raisins and almonds boost iron absorption. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Ripe Banana with chia seeds, Almonds, Flaxseeds, Raisins Bananas provide iron, while chia seeds and flaxseeds add omega-3s and boost iron absorption. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Options (Daily) Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Raw Banana Curry (small serving), Carrot sticks Raw banana provides iron and prebiotics, aiding absorption. Carrots add fiber and antioxidants. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Raw Banana stir-fry with onions, tomatoes Raw banana provides iron, and tomatoes offer vitamin C for enhanced absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Raw Banana stir-fry with spices, tomato Raw banana offers iron, and tomatoes enhance absorption due to their vitamin C content. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Raw Banana stir-fry with coconut and spices Raw banana offers iron, and coconut provides healthy fats that help absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Raw Banana stir-fry with onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes Raw banana provides iron, and tomatoes enhance absorption. Bell peppers add vitamin C. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Avocado Sandwich on Whole Grain Bread Avocados are rich in healthy fats and vitamin C, which enhances iron absorption. Whole grain bread provides fiber and iron. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Idli with Coconut Chutney Idlis are easy to digest and made from fermented rice, which enhances nutrient absorption, paired with coconut chutney for healthy fats. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Uttapam with mixed vegetables Uttapam is made from fermented batter, providing iron and protein, with vegetables enhancing the overall nutritional profile. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Options (Daily) Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Paneer & Spinach Curry, Brown rice, Steamed broccoli Paneer provides iron and protein, spinach boosts absorption of iron, and broccoli provides vitamin C. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Lentil Soup with Paneer & Roasted vegetables (carrots, peas, spinach), Quinoa Lentils are high in iron, pairing with paneer and spinach boosts iron absorption. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Chickpea Salad with cucumber, tomatoes, onions, Paneer stir-fry, Whole grain bread Chickpeas and paneer provide iron, and cucumbers and tomatoes help absorb iron. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Lentil stew (moong dal), Brown rice, Roasted sweet potatoes Lentils are high in iron, and sweet potatoes add antioxidants while brown rice offers fiber. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Soybean curry, Brown rice, Spinach salad Soybeans provide iron, while spinach helps iron absorption. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Soybean curry, Brown rice, Spinach and carrot salad Soybeans provide protein and iron, while spinach and carrots help with absorption. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Soybean curry, Brown rice, Spinach and carrot salad Soybeans provide protein and iron, while spinach helps with absorption. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Options (Daily) Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), Raisins Chickpeas are rich in iron, and raisins help enhance iron absorption due to their vitamin C content. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas) with lemon, Carrot sticks Chickpeas provide iron, and lemon enhances iron absorption from plant sources. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), A handful of raisins Chickpeas are rich in iron, and raisins help absorption due to vitamin C. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), A handful of almonds Chickpeas and almonds boost iron intake and provide healthy fats. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), Raisins Chickpeas provide iron, and raisins help absorption with vitamin C. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), A handful of raisins Chickpeas are rich in iron, and raisins help absorption due to vitamin C. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Boiled Chhola (Chickpeas), A handful of almonds Chickpeas and almonds boost iron intake and provide healthy fats. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Options (Daily) Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Soybean Stir-fry with bell peppers, broccoli, Millet roti Soybeans provide protein and iron, while broccoli helps absorb iron, and millet adds fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Paneer Tikka, Brown rice, Roasted cauliflower Paneer provides iron, and cauliflower adds fiber and antioxidants to aid absorption. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Soybean Stir-fry, Brown rice, Roasted broccoli, Zucchini Soybeans provide iron, broccoli aids absorption, and zucchini adds fiber and antioxidants. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Paneer & Spinach stir-fry, Millet roti, Steamed broccoli Paneer provides protein and iron, spinach helps iron absorption, and millet adds fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Paneer Tikka, Brown rice, Roasted cauliflower, Mixed vegetables Paneer provides iron, cauliflower adds fiber and antioxidants, and mixed vegetables help absorption. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Soybean stir-fry, Millet roti, Spinach and carrot salad Soybeans provide iron, spinach helps absorption, and carrots boost iron levels and vitamin A. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Soybean stir-fry, Brown rice, Spinach & carrot salad Soybeans provide protein and iron, while spinach aids with absorption. 7:00 PM -
